link.title: Link
link.description: The URL of the GitHub repository.

githubOwnerName.title: Github Owner Name
githubOwnerName.description: The name of the user or organization that has administrative control over a repository.

githubOwnerId.title: Github Owner ID
githubOwnerId.description: The if of the user or organization that has administrative control over a repository.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The creation date of the repository.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The last update date of the repository.

readme.title: Repository README
readme.description: The README file of the repository in markdown format

title: Github Team
description: Blueprint defining a GitHub team, detailing its members, repositories, and permissions within an organization.

url.title: Team URL
url.description: The URL of the team's page on GitHub.

repositoryCount.title: Repository Count
repositoryCount.description: The number of repositories the team has access to or manages.

membersCount.title: Members Count
membersCount.description: The number of members in the team.

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: The repositories that the team is working on or has access to.

title: Github Team Member
description: Blueprint defining a member of a GitHub team, including their role within the team.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the member, if publicly available.

username.title: Username
username.description: The GitHub username of the member.

role.title: Role
role.description: The role of the member within the team (e.g., maintainer, member).

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: The team this member is part of

title: Github Pull Request
description: Blueprint defining a GitHub pull request

link.title: Link
link.description: The URL link to the GitHub pull request.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A markdown description of the pull request.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The created date of the pull request.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The last update date of the pull request.

closedAt.title: Closed At
closedAt.description: The closing date of the pull request.

mergedAt.title: Merged At
mergedAt.description: The merge date of the pull request.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the pull request.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: The creator of the pull request.

assignees.title: Assignees
assignees.description: The list of assignees responsible for the pull-request

reviewers.title: Reviewers
reviewers.description: The list of reviewers responsible for the pull-request

link.title: Link
link.description: The URL link to the GitHub issue.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A markdown description of the issue.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The creation date of the issue.

closedAt.title: Closed At
closedAt.description: The closing date of the issue.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The last update date of the issue.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the issue.

issueNumber.title: Issue Number
issueNumber.description: The unique number assigned to the issue.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Labels associated with the issue for categorization.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: The creator of the pull request.

assignees.title: Assignees
assignees.description: The list of assignees responsible for the pull-request

link.title: Link
link.description: The URL link to the GitHub workflow.

configLink.title: Yaml File Link
configLink.description: The URL link to the GitHub workflow YAML configuration file.

path.title: Path
path.description: The file path to the workflow in the repository.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the workflow.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The creation date of the workflow.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The last update date of the workflow.

deletedAt.title: Deleted At
deletedAt.description: The deletion date of the workflow, if applicable.

title: Github Workflow Run
description: Blueprint defining a GitHub Workflow Run

link.title: Link
link.description: The URL link to the GitHub workflow run.

workflowLink.title: Workflow Link
workflowLink.description: The URL link to the GitHub workflow.

artifactsLink.title: Workflow Link
artifactsLink.description: The URL link to th artifacts of the GitHub workflow.

logsLink.title: Workflow Link
logsLink.description: The URL link to the logs of the GitHub Workflow Run.

jobsLink.title: Jobs Link
jobsLink.description: The URL link to the Jobs of the GitHub workflow Run.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the workflow run.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.description: The conclusion status of the workflow run.

runStartedAt.title: Run Started At
runStartedAt.description: The start date and time of the workflow run.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The creation date of the workflow run.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The last update date of the workflow run.

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: The branch of the repository that the workflow ran in.

commitSHA.title: Commit SHA
commitSHA.description: The commit hash of the repository that the workflow ran in.

event.title: Event
event.description: The event associated with the workflow run.

runNumber.title: Run Number
runNumber.description: The unique number assigned to the workflow run.

runAttempts.title: Run Attempts
runAttempts.description: The number of attempts for the workflow run.

title: Github Workflow Job
description: Blueprint defining a GitHub Workflow Job

link.title: Link
link.description: The URL link to the GitHub workflow job.

startedAt.title: Created At
startedAt.description: The creation date of the workflow job.

completedAt.title: Run Started At
completedAt.description: The start date and time of the workflow job.

createdAt.title: Run Created At
createdAt.description: The created date and time of the workflow job.

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the workflow job.

runAttempt.title: Run Attempt
runAttempt.description: The current run attempt of the workflow job.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.description: The conclusion of the workflow job.

workflowRun.title: The workflow run this job belongs to.

url.title: Link
url.description: The URL link to the GitLab merge request.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The timestamp when the environment was created

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the the environment was last updated

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The project this environment belongs to

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the deployment.

state.title: State
state.description: The current state of the deployment.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: Date & Time at which this deployment was executed.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: Date & Time at which this deployment was last updated.

link.title: Link
link.description: Link to the deployment page in Github.

commitSha.title: Commit SHA
commitSha.description: The hash of the commit the deployment targeted.

commitDate.title: Commit Date
commitDate.description: The date of the commit mentioned in the deployment.

successful.title: Successful?
successful.description: A boolean flag indicating if the deployment has finished successfully.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The project this deployment belongs to

triggeredBy.title: Triggered By
triggeredBy.description: The user that triggered this deployment
